title: Happy Birthday! Nozomi-chan
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Alright, we’ve also finished stretching, let’s go back to the clubroom, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uuhh, Nozomi, why don’t we stretch for a little longer?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I think we’ve done enough to be okay, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh, ah, you’re right.... Umm, then, a walk! Why don’t we go for a bit of a walk? It’s also a good cooldown, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, Ai-chan, you’re being way too obvious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aaaah, so you knew?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Honoka-chan and Chikacchi were fidgeting all over the place before practice began, then everyone also went ahead, leaving only you and me behind. I did my best to pretend not to notice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, so the surprise was a failure, huh~! But everyone worked really hard to prepare a cake for your birthday and to decorate the clubroom in a hurry right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah.... It makes me really happy. To have my birthday celebrated like this is beyond anything. I want to thank you too, Ai-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s only natural! After all, everyone loves you, Nozomi! Well, since you found out, then Ai will say it first before everyone else. Nozomi, happy birthday!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
